MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL16 and LL22 postcode areas of Denbigh and Abergele. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate the loss of supply caused by faulty overhead line equipment. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 07:48AM on 9th November 2020
